dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5635 IH: Northern Arizona Protection Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Gosar (for himself, Mr. Crane, Mr. Biggs, and Mr. Newhouse) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To nullify Presidential Proclamation 10606, establishing Baaj Nwaavjo I’tah Kukveni-Ancestral Footprints of the Grand Canyon National Monument and withdrawing certain land in Arizona from mineral entry, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Northern Arizona Protection Act.

section.header: Restriction on use of Antiquities Act in certain areas in Arizona

subsection.text: Presidential Proclamation 10606 of August 8, 2023 (88 Fed. Reg. 55331, relating to the establishment of the Baaj Nwaavjo I’tah Kukveni–Ancestral Footprints of the Grand Canyon National Monument), shall have no force or effect.

No extension or establishment of national monuments within the area generally depicted as Baaj Nwaavjo I’tah Kukveni—Ancestral Footprints of the Grand Canyon National Monument on the map titled Baaj Nwaavjo I’tah Kukveni—Ancestral Footprints of the Grand Canyon National Monument and dated August 5, 2023, may be undertaken except by express authorization of Congress.
